# Xaringan settings

           text_font_google = google_font("PT Sans"), 
           code_font_google = google_font("Inconsolata"),

                  ".remark-inline-code" = list("background" = "#F5F5F5",
                                                #e7e8e2; /* darker */
                                               "border-radius" = "3px",
                                               "padding" = "4px")))
